name: RollyBall Maze
description:
Web Build now available

WASD to move space to jump esc to Pause

Controller move support

2nd level is on a loop with randomized gaps in the trees.

Assets used in the game:

3D Models used: 

- https://quaternius.itch.io/platformer-pack

- https://fertile-soil-productions.itch.io/modular-terrain-pack

- https://kenney.nl/assets/platformer-kit

- https://quaternius.itch.io/lowpoly-robot

- https://quaternius.itch.io/lowpoly-animated-monsters

Music from:

- https://opengameart.org/content/free-music-pack

- https://incompetech.com/music/
